LoginRequest.title: LoginRequest
LoginRequest.description: This is the signature for login request.

client_id.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

client_secret.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

username.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

password.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

TokenResponse.title: TokenResponse
TokenResponse.description: This is signature for successful token response.

accessToken.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

refreshToken.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

AuthTokenRequest.title: AuthTokenRequest
AuthTokenRequest.description: This is the signature for requesting the accessToken and refreshToken.

ResetPasswordPartial.title: ResetPasswordPartial
ResetPasswordPartial.description: This is a signature for reset password. (tsType: Partial<ResetPassword>, schemaOptions: { partial: true })

username.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

password.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

oldPassword.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

ResetPassword.title: ResetPassword
ResetPassword.description: This is a signature for reset password.

username.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

password.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

oldPassword.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

ClientAuthRequest.title: ClientAuthRequest
ClientAuthRequest.description: This is signature for client authentication request.

client_id.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

client_secret.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

OtpSendRequest.title: OtpSendRequest
OtpSendRequest.description: This is the signature for OTP login request.

client_id.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

client_secret.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

key.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

OtpLoginRequest.title: OtpLoginRequest
OtpLoginRequest.description: This is the signature for OTP login request.

key.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

otp.description: This property is supposed to be a string and is a required field

secret.description: Value can be a string or a private key.
